# Pull Request

## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Testing Performed

List local commands and outcomes.

- `./mvnw test`

## Checklist

- [ ] I ran the local verify command (`./mvnw test`, or `mvnw.cmd test` on Windows).
- [ ] I did not commit build outputs (`target`, `dist`, `node_modules`).
- [ ] I updated docs if contracts/config changed.
- [ ] I added/updated Flyway migrations if DB schema changed.
